---
title: "Shiny Application Usage"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: fill
    css: styles.css
runtime: shiny
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
library(DBI)
library(metricsgraphics)
library(shiny)
library(lubridate)
library(prettyunits)

source("helpers.R")

# Grabs ALL the usage data 
data <- reactive({
  # Poll for new data every 5 minutes
  invalidateLater(3e5)
  # This is a fake-o stub!
  data <- get_shiny_usage()
  
  data$started <- ymd_hms(data$started)
  data$ended <- ymd_hms(data$ended)
  data$session_duration <- data$ended - data$started
  data
})

# Just grabs the data for the user's selected app
app_data <- reactive({
  get_shiny_usage(input$app)
})

```



Inputs {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
This report shows usage data for Shiny applications. Summary data is refereshed every 5 minutes. 

Begin by entering an application GUID. An app's GUID can be found at the bottom of the Info pane in application's settings panel.


```{r}
uiOutput("app_select")
output$app_select <- renderUI({
  apps <- data() %>% 
    pull(app_id) %>% 
    unique()
  selectizeInput('app', 'Enter App GUID', apps)  
})

```


Column
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Total Visitor Time

```{r}
renderValueBox({
 tot <- sum(data()$session_duration, na.rm = TRUE)
 valueBox(pretty_dt(tot), "Total Visitor Time", icon = "fa-desktop", color = "#4c83b6") 
})
```

### Total Number of Sessions

```{r}
renderValueBox({
  sess <- nrow(data())
 valueBox(prettyNum(sess, big.mark = ","), "Number of Sessions", icon = "fa-clock", color = "#4c83b6") 
})
```

### Total Unique Users

```{r}
renderValueBox({
 uni <- length(unique(data()$user_guid))
 valueBox(uni, "Unique Users", icon = "fa-user", color = "#4c83b6") 
})
```

Column 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Visits by User

```{r}
renderMetricsgraphics({
  data() %>%
    filter(app_id == input$app) %>% 
    group_by(user_guid) %>% 
    summarise(visits = n()) %>% 
    mutate(username = lookup_users(user_guid)) %>% 
    select(username, visits) %>% 
    arrange(desc(visits)) %>% 
    mjs_plot(x=visits, y=username, width=500, height=400) %>%
      mjs_bar() %>%
      mjs_axis_x(xax_format = 'plain')  
})
```

### Visits Over Time

```{r}
renderMetricsgraphics({
  data() %>%
    filter(app_id == input$app) %>% 
    mutate(day = round_date(started, "day")) %>% 
    group_by(day) %>% 
    summarise(visits = n()) %>% 
    select(day, visits) %>% 
    mutate(day = as.Date(day)) %>% 
    mjs_plot(x=day, y=visits, width=500, height=400) %>%
      mjs_line() %>% 
      mjs_axis_x(xax_format = "date")

})
```

Column 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### App Information

```{r}
DT::renderDataTable({
  data() %>% 
    filter(app_id == input$app) %>% 
    group_by(user_guid) %>% 
    summarise(`# of Visits`= n(), 
              `Time Spent` = pretty_dt(sum(session_duration, na.rm =  TRUE))) %>% 
    mutate(username = lookup_users(user_guid)) %>% 
    select(username, `# of Visits`, `Time Spent`) %>% 
    DT::datatable(options = list(dom = "ft"))
})

```
